oai_dc:dc.dc:title: P.H. Zaidi on Improving Maize Production in Asia
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Asia
Maize
Zaidi
Improvement
Hybrids
Maize
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: CIMMYT Senior Maize Physiologist and Breeder P.H. Zaidi describes the opportunity to be seized by bridging the gap between public sector research and private sector deployment of new maize varieties in Asia.
